attributes.action: Do not raise tuition fees or student expenses after the EU referendum
attributes.additional_details:
Personally, I hope to join a University research team in future for Neuroscience. Without EU funding, my department may struggle. As a student from a low income background, I will not be able to contribute to my degree more than my current tuition fee and loans permit. 

Do not further jeopardize our futures by putting them out of reach for low income students.
attributes.background:
Students and the younger generations are the ones who will live the longest with this decision. 
Those seeking higher education are pursuing careers to better their futures, to develop into people who will contribute to our economy. Do not further diminish their opportunities.

rejection.details:
It's not clear for which types of students you want fees and expenses to be halted, and whether you include bursaries, grants, loans and fee remissions in "student expenses". As such, your petition is not calling for a sufficiently clear action from the Government or Parliament. If you want tuition fees to be frozen for EU students, you could sign this petition: 

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/134389

We also have a number of other petitions open about tuition fees and student funding.
